description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ebbsp","text":"Here, we describe a protocol to generate stable cell lines using a lentivirus system. Please note that necessary safety measures are to be taken in working with lentivirus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

(Sigma)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3c4r","text":"Note: contamination.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Packaging lentiviral plasmid into a lentiviral particles for in…
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"l1kb","text":"Grow HEK293T cells to 60-70% confluency in Growth media in a 6-well Petri Dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Packaging lentiviral plasmid into a lentiviral particles for in…
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a4d1e","text":"Prepare a transfection mix in a sterile 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube, containing: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c18vv","text":"      lentiviral vector   with your gene-of-interest  1500 ng    Gag/Pol plasmid  1000 ng    VSV-G plasmid  500 ng    P3000 reagent (Lipofectamine 3000 kit)  5 µL    OptiMem  125 µL  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":183}],"data":{}},{"key":"42e6e","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["307","71"],"data":[["Lentiviral vector with your gene-of-interest","1500 ng"],["Gag/Pol plasmid","1000 ng"],["VSV-G plasmid","500 ng"],["P3000 reagent (Lipofectamine 3000 kit)","5 µL"],["OptiMem","125 µL"]],"guid":"BB4751CA140C11EEA01B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Lentiviral vector with your gene-of-interest","1500 ng"],["Gag/Pol plasmid","1000 ng"],["VSV-G plasmid","500 ng"],["P3000 reagent (Lipofectamine 3000 kit)","5 µL"],["OptiMem","125 µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7f8tl","text":"Incubate each mixture (from steps 2 and 3) separately for ~   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ebpap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"FEEC82E0140C11EE83AF438B9487C81D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"01B0FA10140D11EE83AF438B9487C81D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"chfdu","text":"Add the mixture drop-wise to the cells from step 1 using a P1000 sterile pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Packaging lentiviral plasmid into a lentiviral particles for in…
Packaging lentiviral plasmid into a lentiviral particles for in…
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2u24h","text":"Collect the supernatant from the cells (that now contains the lentiviruses) and pass it through a   syringe filter. If needed, add fresh growth medium and collect this too   later.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":98,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":172,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"E736C240140D11EE83AF438B9487C81D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"0.45"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"EBECA930140D11EE83AF438B9487C81D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ucnu","text":"Add   of polybrene (8 mg/ml) to   of lentivirus infection media from step 8 to HeLa cells seeded in 6-well plate (at 700.000/well) at 60% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"946uh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"6844BE10140D11EE83AF438B9487C81D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"6B90DBD0140D11EE83AF438B9487C81D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bossm","text":"Change media to fresh medium and incubate until confluency. Split three times before cells can leave the viral S2 lab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9vsc","text":"Cells can now be passaged and plated for experiments or frozen down for long-term storage in liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de3qq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4934q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"dphng","text":"Freezing media: growth media added with 20% FBS and 10% v/v DMSO.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
